name: Eazy Stack - SOA Stack and Builder
short_description: Started protyping a Open Source, SOA Stack setup. An ambitious task in long run, but very crude to begin with, I only want all the components to run in Harmony. This project also at the end aims to produce a framework to generate quick SOA prototypes.
